synopsis.p: Creates tuples for each element of a Cartesian product.

description.p: evaluates anchor as an element list with the corpus as the context element. Each item is hereby called the anchor. evaluates all values of arguments as lists of elements with the anchor as the context element. Then it creates a tuple for each item of the cartesian product of the result of the evaluation of arguments. The tuple will have an argument for each item with the role specified by the keys of arguments.

param-doc.name: relation
param-doc.p: Name of the relation to which tuples are added.

param-doc.name: anchor
param-doc.p: Elements from which arguments are evaluated.
